channel.title: Creating Your First Delphi Programm (tut)
channel.description:
[center][b]Creating Your First Delphi Programm[/b][/center]
[i]in this tutorial you will learn how to create your first Delphi Programm (the Hello world programm) this is the very first programm i have created using Delphi and i found it quite helpfull so here is how it is made.[/i]
[b]Create a New Button and Select it, and in the caption Type "Show Text". now Create a Lable by clicking on the A icon at the top and place it in the center of your work. now click the Lable (text) and in the Caption bit Delete it all, and then double click on the Button your made earlyer and in the middle type.[/b] [code]Lable1.Caption := 'My First Delphi Work';[/code] [b]now press F9 and test[/b]
[i]this is just a quick basic tut on it because im pretty busy making a spell cheker :)[/i]

item.title: Creating Your First Delphi Programm (tut)
item.dc:creator: @Criptic Criptic
item.description:
@Criptic wrote:

[center]Creating Your First Delphi Programm[/center]

in this tutorial you will learn how to create your first Delphi Programm (the Hello world programm) this is the very first programm i have created using Delphi and i found it quite helpfull so here is how it is made.

Create a New Button and Select it, and in the caption Type “Show Text”. now Create a Lable by clicking on the A icon at the top and place it in the center of your work. now click the Lable (text) and in the Caption bit Delete it all, and then double click on the Button your made earlyer and in the middle type.

Lable1.Caption := 'My First Delphi Work';

now press F9 and test

this is just a quick basic tut on it because im pretty busy making a spell cheker
